Nagtanong siya sa tindero pero hindi alam nito. Naghanap si Hiro ng iba pang tao at nakita niya ang drayber ng bus.
He asked the salesman but he didn't know. Hiro looked for someone else and saw the bus driver.
Nagtanong siya kung alam ba niya kung paano magpunta sa Arlington.
He asked if he knew how to get to Arlington.
At ang sabi ng drayber, "Oo, dumiretso ka lang sa Roscoe at kumanan ka sa Wyoming at tapas, kumaliwa ka sa simbahan."
And the driver said, "Yes, just go straight to Roscoe and eat Wyoming and tapas, go left at church."
Nagpasalamat si Hiro sa drayber at nagpunta sa bahay ng kaibigan niya. Nagkita sina Hiro at ang Kaibigan niya.
Hiro thanked the driver and went to his friend's house. Hiro and his Friend meet.
Buong araw silang nag-usap. Masayang-masaya silang dalawa.
They talked all day. They were both very happy.
Noong uuwi na si Hiro, nakita niya na malambot ang gulong ng bisikleta niya.
When he got home, he noticed that the wheels of his bike were soft.
Humiram sila ng pambomba ng gulang sa kapitbahay dahil wala ang kaibigan niya.
They borrowed an age bomb from the neighbor because his friend was absent.
Sa wakas, maayos na ang bisikleta ni Hiro pero ilang sandali humangin nang malakas at bumuhos ang ulan.
Finally, Hiro's bike was well but for a moment the rain started to cry out loud.
Hindi tumitila ang ulan kaya nagpasiya si Hiro na magbus na lang pabalik sa bahay niya. Pagod na pagod si Hiro ngayong araw na ito.
The rain didn't stop, so Hiro decided to go back to his house. Hiro is tired today.
